content.raw: @iche033 , I needed to merge pull request #293 into this one to be able to use `components::Model` in the GUI plugin. That PR fixes the serialization for "tag" components.
content.html: @iche033 , I needed to merge pull request #293 into this one to be able to use components::Model in the GUI plugin. That PR fixes the serialization for "tag" components.

update.description:
Work in progress for the entity tree UI populated using the `EntityComponentManager` and `NetworkManager`.

![tree_1.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1432105045-tree_1.png)

New dependency: `sudo apt install qml-module-qtqml-models2`

## TODO 

Before merging:

* Implement @ColeOSRF 's design (instead of the default Windows XPish look)
* Sort out the "network primary by default" situation so it applies correctly to distributed sim and the GUI

In the future:

* Send updates the other way around (GUI -> Server)
update.title: [Blueprint] [WIP] Entity tree UI

update.description:
Work in progress for the entity tree UI populated using the `EntityComponentManager` and `NetworkManager`.

![tree_1.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1432105045-tree_1.png)

New dependency: `sudo apt install qml-module-qtqml-models2`

Builds on top of:

* ~~pull request #287~~


## TODO

* Implement @ColeOSRF 's design (instead of the default Windows XPish look)
* Consider implementing the `GuiPlugin` class using multiple inheritance like `System`
* Sort out the "network primary by default" situation so it applies correctly to distributed sim and the GUI
* Only send state changes from server to GUI. Right now it's sending the full state at max update rate.
* Send updates the other way around (GUI -> Server)
update.title: [Blueprint] [WIP] Entity tree UI
